mapper.insert: insert into students (student_id, student_name, email, phoneNumber, progress) values (#{student_id,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{student_name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{email,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{phoneNumber,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{progress,jdbcType=INTEGER})
mapper.select: SELECT s.student_id, s.student_name, s.email, s.phoneNumber, s.progress, o.learning_id, o.course_id, o.video_url, o.quiz_Results, a.submission_id, a.teacher_id, a.assignment_name, a.submission_date, a.grade, a.submission_content, g.course_id,g.gradeAndCertificateID, g.finalGrade, g.certificateURL FROM students s LEFT JOIN onlinelearning o ON s.student_id = o.student_id LEFT JOIN assignmentsubmissions a ON s.student_id = a.student_id LEFT JOIN gradesandcertificates g ON s.student_id = g.student_id where s.student_id = #{student_id,jdbcType=INTEGER};

SELECT s.student_id, s.student_name, s.email, s.phoneNumber, s.progress, o.learning_id, o.course_id, o.video_url, o.quiz_Results, a.submission_id, a.teacher_id, a.assignment_name, a.submission_date, a.grade, a.submission_content, g.course_id,g.gradeAndCertificateID, g.finalGrade, g.certificateURL FROM students s LEFT JOIN onlinelearning o ON s.student_id = o.student_id LEFT JOIN assignmentsubmissions a ON s.student_id = a.student_id LEFT JOIN gradesandcertificates g ON s.student_id = g.student_id
